title: APPLESEED - OVA,2004 Film,Ex Machina,Alpha,XIII - 480p-720p x264
description:
Hey guys, this torrent contains EVERYTHING "Appleseed" from 1988 all the way to 2014 (in DUAL Audio, too)! This is what it has PACKED inside:

a. OVA: Appleseed (1988 - 480p).
b. Movies: 2004 Film, Appleseed EX Machina (2007), Appleseed ALPHA (2014) - 720p (all 3 movies).
c. 2011 Series and Feature Films: Appleseed XIII (Show and Feature Films: Tartaros and Ouranos) - 720p (all episodes and films).

P.S: The (1) OVA and (2) MOVIES in this collection up above contain THREE and FOUR audio tracks (which often includes the "Director's Commentary" one) and MULTIPLE "English" subtitle options (sometimes including subs for the commentary parts, too)!!!

Plot Synopsis:

Appleseed (1988 OVA) - "In a vast futuristic city, built on the ashes of the third world war, a police officer and her cyborg partner fight terrorism."

Appleseed (2004 Movie) - "In a utopian society created at the end of the third world war, a female warrior who has been plucked from the badlands begins to see cracks in this new facade. And what does this community have planned for the rest of humankind?"

Appleseed EX Machina (2007 Movie) - "With Brialeos convalescing after a mission, Deunan is assigned a new and remarkably familiar partner as a strange wave of terrorist attacks plague Olympus."

Appleseed ALPHA (2014 Movie) - "Based on the comic book by the creator of Ghost in the Shell, a young female soldier Deunan and her cyborg partner Briareos survive through the post World War 3 apocalyptic New York in search of human's future hope, the legendary city of Olympus."

Appleseed XIII (2011 Series and Films: Tartaros and Ouranos) - "Following World War V, a global-scale conflict fought with non-nuclear weapons that almost halved the earth's population, the city-nation of Olympus stands as a beacon of hope in a world of chaos."

____________________________
